name: Combient AB
goal: Combient´s vision is to Bring Digitalised Industrial Innovations to the industry, through collaboration and knowledge sharing. Founded in January 2015, Combient today supports 29 multinational companies operating out of offices in Stockholm, Gothenburg and Helsinki.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Industrial Policy and Competiveness
Trade Policy
Competition Policy
Company Law/ Shareholders Rights Directive
